productName: Purifying moisturizer with 4% Zinc PCA + Bamboo Extract
productShortDesc: This daily moisturizer is rich in actives known to reduce excess sebum and help prevent breakouts. Adapted for oily skin typologies. 98% naturally derived. Vegan. Made in France.
productIngredients:
THE ACTIVES
Zinc PCA (4%):
A trace element naturally present in the body, zinc is an essential part of many of the body's enzymatic mechanisms from the metabolism of food, supporting our natural defenses and the renewal of tissues.
Derived from beetroot, zinc is ideal for oily skin and significantly reduces sebum (oil) secretion.Coupled with L-Pyrrolidone Carboxylic Acid, zinc promotes cell differentiation and strengthens the skin's barrier function to protect from future flare-ups.
Finally, zinc is also known to limit the development of microorganisms that cause many skin imbalances.
Bamboo extract:
Being naturally porous, bamboo absorbs excess sebum to reduce shine and visible oiliness. We source our bamboo from Indian forests.
Directions of use
This moisturizer is concentrated in zinc PCA, an antibacterial ingredient that reduces blemishes caused by excess sebum. In addition, the mattifying effects of the bamboo extract work to reduce excess skin shine.
